reviewText: Offers a good look into the tour with several great songs from Dre and Snoop with just a small sampling of Cube and Eminem. The sound quality at times is spotty and the camera does jump quite a bit, but it is an enjoyable performance.
Title: N/A

reviewText: A great purchase for those who favour the best of the rap music scene featuring great live performances in 2000 from a list of hip hop giants including Dr Dre, Eminem, Snoop Dogg and Ice Cube just to name a few.The DVD not only features the concerts themselves but backstage and on the road footage of the rappers fooling around, including a lot of weed smoke from many of the dressing rooms. Not only this but other extras include photographs and interviews with the four main rappers. A brilliant sound - this is an unforgettable DVD even if you weren't with the crowd.
summary: A Showcase Of The World's Hottest Label - Shady/Aftermath

reviewText: I actually attended the concert and to buy this DVD was like reliving the whole thing.  The added extras with Snoop at the restuarant with the roach on the wall, to see Xzibit, to see the footage of the people in the audience was simply AMAZING!!!  It was worth the money that I spent on this DVD.  The video quality was excellent as well as the sound.  If you couldn't get to the concert for whatever reason, this is the next best thing to being there live.

reviewText: Very tight video from four of the best artists in Hip Hop.  Dre, Snoop, Cube, & Eminem preform all the hits plus a couple others.  If you're a fan, you gotta pick this one up.  it's pretty tight that it's available on PSP...so u can watch it where ever.  Peace
Title: N/A

reviewText: This is by far the best concert video I've seen so far. From Ice Cube (w/Mac 10, Ren, W.C), Eminem, Snoop, and of course, Dr. Dre, every set is flawless, and 'glossily' well shot. There's even a short film sequence in which Dre & Snoop hook up with some pretty...(ahem) ladies, and get involved in a liquor store shoot-out. There's plenty (and I mean...plenty!) of random women flashing near the end of the DVD, so 'Amazonians', be warned if you're offended by that sort of thing.Other aspects of this DVD that I enjoyed were the behind the scenes segments (i.e. cockroach on the restaurant wall), and the Detroit Controversy bonus segment (that was deep)...Anyhow, I am extremely happy with this purchase. The "Up In Smoke Tour" DVD is truly the total package. Congratulations to Dre, Director Philip Atwell, and the rest of the Aftermath camp for making hip hop history with the tour...and this DVD.Peace!C.H.R.

reviewText: This is the dvd of the summer of 2000 tour by Dre, Em, Cube, and the gang.  It features perfomances by Snoop Dogg, Nate Dogg, Kurupt and all the other crazy kids who headlined this tour.  The production values are top notch excellent sound and picture quality.  There are various extras and some behind the scenes footage as well.  This is a great DVD for fans of gfunk and anyone who attended or missed last summers phattest tour.

reviewText: Bought this DVD new for my PS3 or My new Samsung 3D blu ray player.  Did not play in either one.  Only reason why i bought the dvd is so i didnt bootleg it off the net and i can get tru 1080i upconversion on my 60" Led.  Anyways short story is Most New players only accept NtSF and not Pal.  The Seller did make it right and gave me a refund. Rate, Respond.
summary: Make sure Dvd is not in PAL Format.

Title: N/A

reviewText: This 60+ ex-hippy loves this video. I bought it about two weeks ago and have watched it perhaps 6 times already. Eminem is as brilliant and intense as usual, but the for-real high point is the long Dre/Snoop recitation of "G Thang," leaving the audience to fill in some of the shout-outs, like the one I used for the title, above.The only mystery is why was Ice Cube even there? Or was he really there? I didn't know his work at all, and still don't know it. But It's still a solid gold concert.
Title: N/A

reviewText: If you was one of the unlucky ones that couldnt get tickets to one of the hottest rap tours ever, This DVD is the next best thing.. It puts you in the front row to one of the most exciting one of the most elaborate stage shows ever staged.. The DVD takes you on a 2 hour musical experience unlike no other you would witness  in any genre of music..  The DVD also includes some behind the scene with the artists to give  it that close and personal feel ..  The Sound and picture quality is superb.. The Concert was film in Boston, Mass  but there as other footage from other cities on the tour dealing with talkin with fans,  People that work behind the scene during the tour etc.. All n All gives you a very  in-depth look of the tour and what goes on behind the lights and music..  Highlites of the  DVD Dr. Dre/ Snoop and  Eminem..  Ice Cube portion of the DVD is also pretty good .. If there is a minor criticism to this DVD it would be that some of the performances were shortening.. But nevertheless if you are a fan  of Dre, Snoop, Eminem, Ice Cube this is the DVD to get.. If you were lucky enough to attend the show you want to relive the excitement  get this DVD  you will not be disappointed

reviewText: One of the phattest DVD,no make it 6 mic for the phattest concert on DVD.If you miss the concert last year of summer 2000,buy this dvd.This Is totally awesome,the dolby digital 5.1 surround sound,all I could say is the best sound I've heard today.The up in smoke tour on dvd include your favorite artist like Ice Cube and his westside connection,mack 10 & WC,the crazy Eminem and his D12 crew,super producer Dr.Dre,Xzibit and the doggfather Snoop Dogg.There also behind the scene of making of the tour.Let me tell you about the video of the dvd,there some part that had alot of dust grain,digitally artifacts,muddy and other part which are bright clean picture.That a pretty strange way the Eaglevision production make the picture on dvd.Also the video is on widescreen which is better.The audio well,it kickass!.The LFE which is .1 for subwoofer,it's kick lots of bass on every music they perform.The part I like is the skull which it came near the audeice and the fire explode which is very cool sound on my 6 speaker.You miss the concert,get the DVD ok!"F%#k the VHS!" "I watch DVD everyday."  :-)
summary: IT LIKE BEING AT THE CONCERT.
Title: N/A

reviewText: Ice Cube, Eminem, Dr. Dre and Snoop Dogg are together in this show that'll make you sing, that'll make you laugh, tha'll make you enjoy rap as much as you do.If you are a hip hop fan, I don't have to say how much worth this DVD is... Ice Cube (I didn't know him before this DVD) introduces himself in a very cool way, with a bunch of cool songs. Eminem (the reason I bought this DVD) doesn't have that big production, no big introduction, but his songs are great, mainly from Marshall Mathers LP album (The Real Slim Shady, Criminal, Kill You, Marshall Mathers...). And then you can check out Dr. Dre and Snoop Dogg, two hip hop legends, together. This is the best show I've ever seen.. They have an intro video (who was banished from everyone under the age of 17) which rocks... I can't even describe.The image is great, cameras change quickly... It's like a 150 minute videoclip. The 5.1 Surround Sound is awesome too, you feel like you are in the middle of the crowd, seeing these hip hop legends singing. Plus there are lots of backstage scenes, so you can see what stars do backstage...It's explicit because there is a lot of cussing and a lot of naked women. Just that...The extras are mainly the trailer, Snoop Dogg talking, you know, nothing big.. But just to watch this show is a reason to buy it. Highly recommended. Five stars, extra fun for hip hop fans, lots of fun to non-hip hop fans.
Title: N/A
